title: British Coalminers Strike With A Gay Coalition In 'Pride,' A Crowd-Pleaser
teaser: The film is based on a true story about the '80s strike Margaret Thatcher vowed to break. It's full of the Britain's best actors, and nearly every line makes you cackle or puts a lump in your throat.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
